snippet: The N.B.A. formally charged the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers with conduct that has hurt the league and set up a timetable to remove him.
abstract: NBA takes the next step in its attempt to terminate Donald Sterling’s ownership of Los Angeles Clippers by formally charging him with conduct that has adversely affected the league and establishing a timetable for his potential ouster.

byline.original: By ANDREW KEH and SCOTT CACCIOLA

lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. formally charged the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers with conduct that has hurt the league and set up a timetable to remove him.

headline.main: Clock Ticks on Sterling’s Potential Removal
headline.print_headline: Clock Ticks on Sterling’s Potential Removal
